column4: *question* i have a netbook running 10.04 and some windows extend past the bottom of the screen...what can i do to fix it?

here's a help for you. not a solution but a help. the solution is in the display driver. --> the help. you can press the alt key and then drag the window from any part of the window, not just the drag bar.
that way you can get to the buttons at the bottom of the window
you might want to look up something on that site.
